name: EDQL: Elasticsearch Data Query Language
description:
EDQL: Elasticsearch Data Query Language, it's fully compatible Kibana Dev Tools query, can run on intellij directly and visualise data result as compact table, since JSON is noise, and it's hard to view directly, table view maybe it's better to view the result. Also I am exploring a better view to display these JSON results to have a directly view. Have fun :)
Features:
  1. script language query from Elasticsearch
  2. variables bind, and ide jumping support(go to declaration, find usages), variable types: string, boolean, number and json object
  3. HOST bind
  4. keyword autocomplete
  5. code format enabled
  6. data result visualization
  7. runnable support
  8. highlight keyword
  9. live templates: tq, ag, avg etc
Example:(test.edql) 
      HOST http://localhost:9200
      Authorization "Basic xxx"
      local myindex="myindex"
      local fields=["a", "b", "c"]

      # my request
      POST $myindex/_search
      {
        "_source": $fields,
        "query": {
            "match_all": {}
        }
      }
